name: [Corgi Jam!] Adventurer's Befuddled Corgi (ABC)
description:
Game made for CorgiJam

I've wanted to include so much more into this game, but unfortunately, I've ran out of time >w< )//  The game's concept and lore will be expanded on in the future (if I ever find the time) and more mobs and mechanics will be added. These will all be included in a separate future file while the main jam entry, ABC Platformer, that was done in two weeks will remain mostly untouched.

It was a thoroughly fun and challenging experience as this was my very first game project that I've completed - or at least one that can be considered as 'complete'.

All the other entries are fairly nice as well, and you should definitely try those out, too. Hope you enjoy playing Adventurer's Befuddled Corgi, and if you have any suggestions please let me know!

Controls:

Movement - [arrow keys]

Jump - [spacebar]

Magic Bullet/Interact - [Z]

Please inform me if there are any tiny bugs that evaded my vision.
